title: Repair and Building Records
agency_request_summary: Records of all repairs made to the elevators at 130 Stuyvesant Place, Staten Island, for two years prior to the date of accident and to date; films or videos for the date of accident of the incident that occurred on the above-referenced date at the above-referenced premises located at, near, or in the elevator on the 5th floor to the far right; identify all cameras that are in the location of the premises as mentioned above; copies of all Police Reports or Incident Reports relating to the happening of the above-referenced incident.  In addition, please provide telephone calls made to 311, complaint ticket numbers, reason for complaint, copies of any written documents concerning the complaints made for the premises named above.  We need the records of all permits, contracts, construction permits, as well as all prior written notice for the above-referenced location for five (5) years prior to the date of the accident.
